measured_by: prediction task estimating future assets and debts
justification: “For the prediction task, participants were instructed … to predict the future value of their assets and debts one year from now.”

measured_by: choice between an interest-based savings account and a prize-linked savings account
justification: “In the investment decision task, participants were presented with … a choice between investing half of their assets in one of two different savings accounts.”

measured_by: 13-point scale of predicted percentage change in assets
justification: “Participants reported the predicted change in their assets on a 13 point scale: 1 = ‘decrease by more than 5%’ … 13 = ‘increase by more than 5%’.”

measured_by: 13-point scale of predicted percentage change in debts
justification: “They made separate predictions for assets and debts, similar to Experiments 1-3,” followed by the identical 13-point percentage change scale description for debts.

measured_by: hypothetical $1000 allocation between a US stock market index fund and a 2 % bond
justification: “Participants were told ‘Imagine that you received $1,000 … How much of this money would you invest in the US stock market … versus a bond earning 2% with certainty?’”
